00032 #define ENC_ISO_8859_14_TO_LOWER_CASE(c) EncISO_8859_14_ToLowerCaseTable[c]
00033 #define ENC_IS_ISO_8859_14_CTYPE(code,ctype) \
00034   ((EncISO_8859_14_CtypeTable[code] & CTYPE_TO_BIT(ctype)) != 0)

00105 
00106 static int
00107 mbc_case_fold(OnigCaseFoldType flag,
00108                           const UChar** pp, const UChar* end ARG_UNUSED,
00109                           UChar* lower, OnigEncoding enc ARG_UNUSED)
00110 {
00111   const UChar* p = *pp;
00112 
00113   if (*p == 0xdf && (flag & INTERNAL_ONIGENC_CASE_FOLD_MULTI_CHAR) != 0) {
00114     *lower++ = 's';
00115     *lower   = 's';
00116     (*pp)++;
00117     return 2;
00118   }
00119 
00120   *lower = ENC_ISO_8859_14_TO_LOWER_CASE(*p);
00121   (*pp)++;
00122   return 1; /* return byte length of converted char to lower */
00123 }
00124 
00125 #if 0
00126 static int
00127 is_mbc_ambiguous(OnigCaseFoldType flag,
00128                  const UChar** pp, const UChar* end)
00129 {
00130   int v;
00131   const UChar* p = *pp;
00132 
00133   if (*p == 0xdf && (flag & INTERNAL_ONIGENC_CASE_FOLD_MULTI_CHAR) != 0) {
00134     (*pp)++;
00135     return TRUE;
00136   }
00137 
00138   (*pp)++;
00139   v = (EncISO_8859_14_CtypeTable[*p] & (BIT_CTYPE_UPPER | BIT_CTYPE_LOWER));
00140   if ((v | BIT_CTYPE_LOWER) != 0) {
00141     return TRUE;
00142   }
00143 
00144   return (v != 0 ? TRUE : FALSE);
00145 }
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 static int
00149 is_code_ctype(OnigCodePoint code, unsigned int ctype, OnigEncoding enc ARG_UNUSED)
00150 {
00151   if (code < 256)
00152     return ENC_IS_ISO_8859_14_CTYPE(code, ctype);
00153   else
00154     return FALSE;
00155 }

00207 static int
00208 apply_all_case_fold(OnigCaseFoldType flag,
00209                                 OnigApplyAllCaseFoldFunc f, void* arg,
00210                                 OnigEncoding enc ARG_UNUSED)
00211 {
00212   return onigenc_apply_all_case_fold_with_map(
00213              sizeof(CaseFoldMap)/sizeof(OnigPairCaseFoldCodes), CaseFoldMap, 1,
00214              flag, f, arg);
00215 }
00216 
00217 static int
00218 get_case_fold_codes_by_str(OnigCaseFoldType flag,
00219                                        const OnigUChar* p, const OnigUChar* end,
00220                                        OnigCaseFoldCodeItem items[],
00221                                        OnigEncoding enc ARG_UNUSED)
00222 {
00223   return onigenc_get_case_fold_codes_by_str_with_map(
00224              sizeof(CaseFoldMap)/sizeof(OnigPairCaseFoldCodes), CaseFoldMap, 1,
00225              flag, p, end, items);
00226 }
